See also: aussage

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From aussagen (“to state”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈaʊ̯sˌzaːɡə/
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Aus‧sa‧ge

Noun[edit]

Aussage f (genitive Aussage, plural Aussagen)

  1. (logic) proposition
  2. statement

Declension[edit]

Declension of Aussage

indef.def.noundef.noun
nominativeeinedieAussagedieAussagen
genitiveeinerderAussagederAussagen
dativeeinerderAussagedenAussagen
accusativeeinedieAussagedieAussagen

Derived terms[edit]

  • aussagefähig

  • Fehlaussage
  • Nullaussage
